title: gunhell16
author: gunhell16
created_time: June 19, 2022, 12:57:14 PMLast edit: June 19, 2022, 01:59:15 PM by gunhell16
content: Hello everyone, We all know that crypto gambling casinos became a part of the daily lives of the gamblers here in this business industry. On this article, we will disuss if this is really accurate or precise if we follow them all as an individual gamblers, so Join with me in this discussion. Tips to win at Casino such as follows:1. Be sure to check out which games they offer and compare each game's house edge.2. Choose Games With Low Bet Sizes.3. Look for Bonuses. 4. Only Play with Money You Can Afford5. Play with Real Money. To make money, bet real money.6. Play Slots. Although it might seem like a good way to win big, slots are not the best choice for players who want to turn casino gambling     into a profitable hobby.7. Be Selective. Play at a reliable casino8. Do Not Underestimate the Power of Patience. 9. Track your Winnings and Losses.10. Stick to What You Know.Referrence: https://www.bitrates.com/news/p/how-to-win-at-cryptocurrency-casinos-top-ten-tipsTricks and Tips how to win Big at Crypto SlotsBut before we proceed let us know first What is Crypto slots?Answer:QuoteCryptocurrency slots are a type of slot machine that allows you to gamble with cryptocurrencies. They are similar to traditional slot machines, but they offer a unique twist that allows you to use cryptocurrencies to place your bets. This makes them an exciting option for those who want to gamble with Bitcoin or other cryptocurrencies.How to play Crypto Slots?Answer:QuoteYou first need to select a bet size and then spin the reels. If you match three or more symbols on a pay line, you will win a prize. 1. Beware of tricks2. Don’t bet your life savings.3. Play the demo before playing for real money.4. Don’t be afraid to try new casinos. 5. Follow the news.6. Keep an eye on the game jackpot. 7. Bonus hunters, do your research.8. Gamble responsibly. 9. Read the terms and conditions.10. Choose a reputable casino. Referrence: https://back2gaming.com/guides/how-to-win-big-at-crypto-slots/I would like to ask some questions according to the article we are talking about, Is there anyone here in this forum who followed these tips before it was even posted here to win well at crypto slots or the casino? Your answers will be a great addition to the industry we are dealing with in crypto gambling casinos?

comments.author: serjent05
comments.body: I like playing slots, whenever I visit a casino site, the slot is the only game I play.  This kind of tip doesn't work to increase the percentage of winnings IMHO.  The slot game is purely base on luck.  So there is no workaround to increase our chance of winning.  Hitting free spins and scatters is all random.  Sometimes we hit it with just a spin while often times we need hundreds to thousand before hitting free spins or scatters.  But all in all nice try in giving us tips to win in cryptocurrency casinos.

comments.author: Slow death
comments.body: first of all i would like to know why this:" This is a self-moderated topic. If you don't want to be moderated by the person who started this topic, create a new topic."?secondly I would like to say that I just saw random things in this article, I didn't see anything concrete that could be useful for someone who wants to make a profit with casinos. In other words, the article is just giving advice on how to behave in games of chance. The truth is that the people who really make money from gambling, they don't give advice to anyone.

comments.author: robelneo
comments.body: Quote from: gunhell16 on June 19, 2022, 12:57:14 PMTips to win at Casino such as follows:1. Be sure to check out which games they offer and compare each game's house edge.2. Choose Games With Low Bet Sizes.3. Look for Bonuses. 4. Only Play with Money You Can Afford5. Play with Real Money. To make money, bet real money.6. Play Slots. Although it might seem like a good way to win big, slots are not the best choice for players who want to turn casino gambling     into a profitable hobby.7. Be Selective. Play at a reliable casino8. Do Not Underestimate the Power of Patience. 9. Track your Winnings and Losses.10. Stick to What You Know.Good compilation and the title is just right, these are just possibilities but not guaranteed to make you win in gambling, you are already a winner if you can play with money that you can afford to lose and play with a mindset that you want to have fun or be entertained, we need not stress ourselves employing techniques to try to win, because, in reality, we can only try to win but since this is a luck based game, our chances is lesser than the house.

comments.author: Gianluca95
comments.body: Your advice are so dangerous sir, because a new player which reads you, can think that he can win with your advice, and that isn't real.Your advice are good, but you should also keep in mind probability theorema, and consider that in long terms you're going to lose all of your money. The best thing is not to be addicted, play for fun, and when you've wina good amount, withdraw everything and stop.

comments.author: acroman08
comments.body: Quote from: gunhell16 on June 19, 2022, 12:57:14 PMTricks and Tips how to win Big at Crypto Slotsthis part and the contents below feel like just a bit of advice on how to properly handle yourself when gambling or when you're just starting at a casino and to make sure that don't miss out on good promotions from gambling sites. is it really a tips and tricks on how to win big at crypto slots?

comments.author: swogerino
comments.body: The only one advice from your list which increases the chances to win is to play at games with the lowest possible bet.That is because by playing with the lowest bets in the slot machines we can play longer although our max win can be less overall it increases our chances of win because each spin is independent of each other.theAlso the one to never underestimate patience is a really great advice which every time I forget it,I end up in ruin by losing everything,and every time I don't,the minimum I come back with my money,at best I win some extra money.

comments.author: panjul07
comments.body: Quote from: gunhell16 on June 19, 2022, 12:57:14 PMI would like to ask some questions according to the article we are talking about, Is there anyone here in this forum who followed these tips before it was even posted here to win well at crypto slots or the casino? Your answers will be a great addition to the industry we are dealing with in crypto gambling casinos?Based on the 10 tips given by the writer of the article, as a gambler who like to play slot games much I do use most of the tips. However I do not agree with the "dont be afraid to try new casinos", I'll prefer to say "be cautious with new casino" or at least be selective in choosing casino to play. I've said previously few times in other threads, the best way to play slot games is if you like it and when there is specific promotion that give us other chance to get extra money.

Bonus hunters, do your research.8. Gamble responsibly. 9. Read the terms and conditions.10. Choose a reputable casino. I use these tips to play, but 3 didn't used. because I prefer to use crypto/money to play, according to my experience when playing Demo and Realplay it is different. I often win in Demo but not with Realplay, if just want to know how to play then I will just open rules about on game there.4, I agree with @panjul07 is more dangerous if play on a new site, it doesn't have a reputation.

comments.author: Ulven
comments.body: My strategy while joining in gambling I guarantee myself that I am a loser 200% and this helps me a lot in not losing big money by betting what I can afford and not chasing the loss.I think that the above tips do not help much to win the jackpot because winning in the gambling world depends on luck, if you are unlucky, you cannot win and the casino remains the most likely to win.

comments.author: serjent05
comments.body: Quote from: Doell on June 19, 2022, 04:32:55 PM4, I agree with @panjul07 is more dangerous if play on a new site, it doesn't have a reputation.I got the idea of playing on a new site.  New sites often have many bonuses.  That is their way to attract players.  With these lots of bonuses in hand, the chance of taking profit increases with the chance of betting more due to the deposit bonus or free spins that are available for new sites' promotions.

comments.body: Quote from: Ulven on June 19, 2022, 05:00:00 PMMy strategy while joining in gambling I guarantee myself that I am a loser 200% and this helps me a lot in not losing big money by betting what I can afford and not chasing the loss.I think that the above tips do not help much to win the jackpot because winning in the gambling world depends on luck, if you are unlucky, you cannot win and the casino remains the most likely to win.same is the problem with me - I too am an absolute loser. I never win. So I have stopped gambling after I started getting impatient after every loss - and i lost so much money. My health deteriorated and my mind was not at ease. So I left gambling for good.

On this article, we will disuss if this is really accurate or precise if we follow them all as an individual gamblers, so Join with me in this discussion. Tips to win at Casino such as follows:1. Be sure to check out which games they offer and compare each game's house edge.2. Choose Games With Low Bet Sizes.3. Look for Bonuses. 4. Only Play with Money You Can Afford5. Play with Real Money. To make money, bet real money.6. Play Slots. Although it might seem like a good way to win big, slots are not the best choice for players who want to turn casino gambling     into a profitable hobby.7. Be Selective. Play at a reliable casino8. Do Not Underestimate the Power of Patience. 9. Track your Winnings and Losses.10. Stick to What You Know.These are all good advice but I doubt if a player can follow all these advice, gamblers tend to forget some of the golden rules in gambling even the simple rule of only investing what you can afford to lose, even if we tell ourselves that we will play for fun we are tempted to win more when we experience winning streaks, our subconscious mind tells us to gamble properly but our conscious mind tells us that we can make money from gambling and most of the time the conscious minds win, these are two-part of our minds that always contradict each other in gambling.

comments.author: chaser15
comments.body: I don't consider those "tips to win" as can increase our chances of winning. It's more as advice for me and not as a tip. Not even close to the methods of winning. There's no shared strategy too and just simple and basic advice.  Maybe good for newbies though.Quote from: gunhell16 on June 19, 2022, 12:57:14 PMI would like to ask some questions according to the article we are talking about, Is there anyone here in this forum who followed these tips before it was even posted here to win well at crypto slots or the casino? Your answers will be a great addition to the industry we are dealing with in crypto gambling casinos?We should gamble in our own way. Yes, tips and advice are good but as we progress in gambling, we will learn how to deal with the situation in the long run. I never follow tips but I am able to create a good gambling experience with my own way and strategy. I know that's the case too on most gamblers here.

comments.author: crzy
comments.body: Quote from: Ulven on June 19, 2022, 05:00:00 PMMy strategy while joining in gambling I guarantee myself that I am a loser 200% and this helps me a lot in not losing big money by betting what I can afford and not chasing the loss.I think that the above tips do not help much to win the jackpot because winning in the gambling world depends on luck, if you are unlucky, you cannot win and the casino remains the most likely to win.Proper mindset it a big help though the tips above can also help you to become more responsible so maybe it can help you more profitable by being responsible on your gambling activities.I also have this mindset that only gamble with your extra money and if you don’t have extra, just watch sports and know where to bet later on. We all have ways to become more responsible in gambling, and I hope this can help you as well.

comments.author: harizen
comments.body: Quote from: gunhell16 on June 19, 2022, 12:57:14 PMI would like to ask some questions according to the article we are talking about, Is there anyone here in this forum who followed these tips before it was even posted here to win well at crypto slots or the casino? Your answers will be a great addition to the industry we are dealing with in crypto gambling casinos?I believe those listed tips are a common and usual approach when playing at casinos. It's more to me as good advice for newbies before they decide to risk their money doing gambling at casinos. But honestly, any tips or advice can't be followed 100% as even a newbie already do their homework on what to do first, once they are now in actual gambling, they will be put in a different situation making them feel pressured to win. And in the event of loss, surely they will feel regret and disappointment.Our own way to improve our gambling management depends only on us and while we lurk at gambling every day, we will automatically learn how to set up and form a good strategy in order to increase our winning chance rate. Nothing beats the personal experience compared to just reading advice or any articles that claim to increase our chances of winning.

comments.author: Baofeng
comments.body: Of course there are a lot of tips from that article that some of us have followed before. But I guess each and everyone is different, specially those who have a lot of experience already.I guess you don't make things complicated, just play what you love and bet with the money that you can afford to lose. Don't be greedy and this might be your downfall. And if you win, even by little amount, then log out and play the next day. Don't think that you will not lose because you are lucky, because the longer you play, the house edge are going to catch up with you in the long run.

comments.author: Yogee
comments.body: The supposed tip to win at a casino also have this?Quote6. Play Slots. Although it might seem like a good way to win big, slots are not the best choice for players who want to turn casino gambling    into a profitable hobby.This is more like saying only play slots for fun or to win small change. It's not really a bad advice but I expected better "tip".Quote from: serjent05 on June 19, 2022, 01:17:59 PMI like playing slots, whenever I visit a casino site, the slot is the only game I play.  This kind of tip doesn't work to increase the percentage of winnings IMHO.  The slot game is purely base on luck.I don't often play slots but anyone familiar with the game can agree that mostly the "tips to win" listed in the post are merely to manage your risks.

comments.author: Vaskiy
comments.body: You're good enough to follow all these tricks and finally you don't have a good luck, then this is going to be a loss. These tips and tricks will increase the chance of winning, but they don't assure of making a win. When you enter a casino, the prime focus needs to be to have fun for some time period. Same time you should have your own limits on funding, without which gambling could turn to be addictive.
